title: American Horror Story Season 8 AND 9 NEWS
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: He also said s8 is a projection story so it’ll be 10-20 years in the future. 2028-2038.
That crossover season is going to be absolutely everything. That's basically everyone we love from AHS franchise world.

I would love for the season to be about the future but instead there's no  flying cars and robot maids. The seasons going to show how us humans destroyed our planet. The season would show the struggle of people trying to survive.
It could be very cool to see a season in the future. As long as they don't include flying cars and stuff like that.
I really wonder what a whole season crossover between murder house and coven will be about. And what about characters like violet and zoey? So many questions
description:
American Horror Story Season 8 AND 9 NEWS

Ryan Murphy answered questions at the Television Critics Association on Friday, January 5th, 2018. Here is brief summary on his responses.
